title: The BUA for the grant of DRC shall be equal to BUA of the sanctioned Slum Rehabilitation Project allowed to be taken in the form of TDR& as approved by CEO SRA
clause_text: The BUA for the grant of DRC shall be equal to BUA of the sanctioned Slum Rehabilitation Project allowed to be taken in the form of TDR& as approved by CEO SRA.
section: Additional Regulations for the grant of TDR to the Developers/Co- operative Housing Societies/NGOs in respect of slum rehabilitation scheme vide DCR 33(10) and DCR 33(11)

source_pdf.text_snippet: The BUA for the grant of DRC shall be equal to BUA of the sanctioned Slum Rehabilitation Project allowed to be taken in the form of TDR& as approved by CEO SRA.
